translation.en: I can't breathe. [man] Please stay calm.
[woman 2] Honey, this is just what labor feels like, okay?
translation.it: Tesoro, è normale durante il travaglio.

translation.en: [woman 2] There's nothing wrong. You're fine. It's all in your head.
translation.it: Non c'è nulla che non va. Sta bene. È tutto nella sua testa.

translation.en: [doctor] You had a complex delivery, Ms. May.
translation.it: Ha avuto un parto complicato, sig.ra May.

translation.en: You lost a near-fatal amount of blood, and we nearly lost you.
translation.it: Ha perso molto sangue e noi stavamo per perdere lei.

translation.en: -[grunts] -I'll give you something to relax. Okay?
translation.it: Le do qualcosa per rilassarsi. Ok?

translation.en: -No, I want to see my baby. -Go to sleep.
translation.it: - No, voglio vedere la mia bimba. - Dorma.

translation.en: I want to see my baby.
[nurse] The bleeding should ease up within two weeks. If it doesn't, give us a call, okay?
translation.it: Se l'emorragia non si attenua entro due settimane, ci chiami.

translation.en: And make sure that you take these meds only as instructed. Got it?
translation.it: Si assicuri di prendere i farmaci secondo le indicazioni. Va bene?

translation.en: Mom? I have been ringing and ringing, but you know that. [scoffs]
translation.it: - Mamma? - Ho chiamato e richiamato, ma tu lo sai.

translation.en: What you trying to do? Snatch your body back?
translation.it: Stai cercando di rimetterti in forma?

translation.en: And why is the door unlocked? Come here.
translation.it: E perché la porta è aperta? Alzati.

translation.en: What do you mean, he left?
translation.it: In che senso se n'è andato?

translation.en: Gemina, why didn't you say something?
It's fine. I'm fine. It probably should have happened a long time ago.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Sto bene. Sarebbe dovuto succedere tempo fa.

translation.en: Probably! But you thought Shawn shit ice cream.
translation.it: Forse! Ma pensavi che Shawn facesse la cacca d'oro.

translation.en: [Gemina] Maybe losing the baby was a blessing.
translation.it: Forse perdere la bambina è stata una benedizione.

translation.en: And it should never have happened. None of it.
translation.it: E non sarebbe mai dovuto succedere tutto ciò.

translation.en: That's why I had you guys at home.
translation.it: Ecco perché vi ho partorito in casa.
Solo io e la mia ostetrica.

translation.en: We pulled you out with our four hands.
translation.it: Ti abbiamo tirato fuori con le nostre mani.

translation.en: -Your daddy just stood and watched. -Stood and watched.
And I told you what to do!
translation.it: E io ti avevo detto cosa fare.

translation.en: -Shawn wanted to go to the hospital. -[mom] Shawn was not having a baby.
translation.it: - Shawn voleva andare in ospedale. - Shawn non doveva partorire.
Shawn è un fottuto codardo, ovviamente.

translation.en: I'm in awe of you, Gemina.
[nurse] Make sure that you take these meds only as instructed. Got it?
translation.it: Prenda i farmaci solo secondo le indicazioni. Ok?

translation.en: [doctor] This is why I stressed the importance of great self-care.
translation.it: Ecco perché è importante prendersi molta cura di sé.

translation.en: Pregnant women have all kinds of symptoms.
translation.it: Le donne incinte hanno tutti i sintomi.

translation.en: [doctor] Preeclampsia can go undetected until it's too late.
translation.it: La preeclampsia può restare silente finché non è troppo tardi.

translation.en: [Gemina] Why didn't you listen to me?
[man on recording] Hey, Gemina, it's James.
I'm just calling you back. Again. Um…
Yeah, I ran into your mom.
Just hit me back when you get a chance.
How did you get in here?
Come on. Go to your own home.
[Gemina] I told you about the bleeding.
I told you about the pain. You weren't listening--
translation.it: Ti avevo detto del dolore. Non hai ascoltato...

translation.en: I know you have a high-pressure job, travel a lot--
translation.it: So che il lavoro la stressa, viaggia molto...

translation.en: I told you something wasn't right.
translation.it: Ti avevo detto che qualcosa non andava.

translation.en: [doctor] Now I'm going to ask you to please stay calm.
translation.it: Ora le chiedo di mantenere la calma.

translation.en: Being disrespectful is not gonna help anything, Gemma.
translation.it: Essere scortese non serve a niente, Gemma.

translation.en: [Gemina] This is why you don't have glass in the shower, Gemina.
translation.it: Ecco perché non ci sono i vetri nella doccia, Gemina.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, it's me. It's James.
Right. Oh my God. I'm sorry.
[chuckling] You scared the shit out of me.
You said you was freaked out, but the front door was unlocked.
translation.it: Hai detto che eri spaventata, ma la porta era aperta.

translation.en: At least, I… I thought I did.
Well, you get a low score for security, Gem.
translation.it: Metterò un punteggio basso sulla sicurezza.

translation.en: -It's okay. It's okay. It's okay. -I'm a mess.
-[James] You're fine. -I don't know what's happening to me.
translation.it: - Va tutto bene. - Non so cosa mi sia successo.

translation.en: [James] I'm here. How about I get you a glass of water?
translation.it: Sono qui. Vuoi un bicchiere d'acqua?

translation.en: I think… I think someone's trying to kill me.
To kill you? Who? Like, what are you talking about?
translation.it: Ucciderti? Chi? Di cosa stai parlando?

translation.en: -Why would you say something like that? -James. My face.
translation.it: - Perché dici questo? - James. La mia faccia.

translation.en: I'm right here, man, and I ain't going nowhere.
translation.it: Sono qui e non andrò da nessuna parte.

translation.en: So, if you need me to take a look around,
There, coast is clear. There's no one in here.
translation.it: Via libera. Non c'è nessuno qui.

translation.en: Mmm. Searching the house like I was FBI.
translation.it: Ho perlustrato casa tua come fossi dell'FBI.

translation.en: -Come here. I know what this is. -What… What is?
translation.it: - Vieni qui. So cosa vuoi. - Che cosa?

translation.en: I'm the hero, and you're the damsel in distress.
translation.it: Io sono l'eroe e tu la damigella in pericolo.

translation.en: [sighs] Come on, stop playing. -Come here. -Hey, stop.
Look, I know you're lonely. I'm lonely too.
translation.it: So che ti senti sola. Anch'io mi sento solo.

translation.en: Are you ser-- You're a fucking psycho.
[splutters] Hold on. Seriously. What are you talking about?
translation.it: Aspetta. Sul serio. Di cosa stai parlando?

translation.en: James, I thought we were just friends.
You want to sit here and tell me you… you don't know what's up?
translation.it: Vuoi dirmi che non sai cosa succede?

translation.en: Bit of advice? Lock your fucking door.
♪ I fear that everything is happening In this world ♪ ♪ Some days it brings me to my knees ♪
translation.it: COSA SERVIRÀ PER PROTEGGERE LE DONNE NERE? DI GEMINA MAY
